definition: to neglect/to skip (class or work)/to waste (time)/vast/loose-fitting

sentences.english: An unexcused absence, as from school or a class.
sentences.chinese: 旷课，逃避未经允许的缺席，如。

sentences.english: Well, if you lot are playing hooky today, no way I'm going to work.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，如果今天你们全都旷课，那我也不去上班。

sentences.english: Avoid sending long excuses about why you missed class.
sentences.chinese: 不要给出关于你为什么旷课的冗长的借口。

sentences.english: British announced plans to charge parents of truant children on-the-spot fines.
sentences.chinese: 英国宣布向旷课学生的家长即场罚款的计划。

sentences.english: I know, my teacher for unexcused absences also very angry.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，老师对于我的无故旷课也非常的生气。

sentences.english: Absences must be cleared promptly within 2 weeks. After two weeks, an uncleared absence will be counted as a truancy .
sentences.chinese: 缺席者应于二周内完成补假手续，否则以旷课论。

sentences.english: Many teachers think that cheating is less tolerable than truancy.
sentences.chinese: 许多教师认为作弊比旷课更不容忍。

sentences.english: The school truancy problem is worse than thought.
sentences.chinese: 这显示学校的旷课问题比所想的严重。

sentences.english: Students will not be allowed to make up work missed during unexcused absences.
sentences.chinese: 学生旷课期间所缺课程学校不负责补课。

sentences.english: The boy is so free and easy that he is always absent from school.
sentences.chinese: 这孩子太自由散漫以致经常旷课。

sentences.english: Call it a last-ditch effort to tackle truancy in Orange County.
sentences.chinese: 把这称为解决橘郡旷课问题的最后一搏。

sentences.english: Schools lose about $35 per day for each absent student.
sentences.chinese: 学校一天为每一个旷课的学生损失35美元。

sentences.english: Unapproved leave will count as unexcused absences.
sentences.chinese: 未经批准擅自休假者将按旷课处理。

sentences.english: The boy couldn't give a legitimate reason for being absent from school.
sentences.chinese: 这男孩对于旷课提不出正当的理由。

sentences.english: Students will not be allowed to make up for work missed during unexcused absences.
sentences.chinese: 学生旷课期间所缺课程学校不负责补课。

sentences.english: Unapproved leave will count as an unexcused absence.
sentences.chinese: 未经批准擅自休假者将按旷课处理。

definition: to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to be absent from work or school
to leave early (before the stipulated finishing time)/to retire early (from one's job)
to repeat a year in school
to drag out a lesson/to insist on extending class after the bell
